alert.note: Alert for Chase (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 2:42AM CDT until June 07 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls affecting Chase County. Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties. For the Cottonwood River...including Florence, Cottonwood Falls, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying areas and cropland can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 2.8 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Cottonwood River Cottonwood Fall 9.0 9.3 Sun 7 pm CDT 8.7 7.2 4.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
